mean_cn: adj. 外围的；  n. 外围设备
mean_en: not as important as the main aim, part, etc. of something; connected with the outer edge of a particular area; (of equipment) connected to a computer
sentence: A computer comes with many peripheral devices such as printers.
sentence_trans: 电脑有许多外围设备，比如说打印机。
word_etyma: peri外层 + pher带来 + al属于……的 → 外围的；外围设备
